name: FG Recent plugins
author: Frédéric GILLES

sections.description:
This plugin adds a list on the Plugins screen to display only the recent plugins, that means the active plugins and the recently active plugins.
It also shows this list by default instead of all the plugins.
It can be useful for developers that have many hundreds of inactive plugins on their development site. It will spare a few seconds every time you go on the Plugins screen.

Translations

  • English (default)
  • Esperanto (eo)
  • French (fr_FR)
sections.installation:
1. Install the plugin in the Admin => Plugins menu => Add New => Upload => Select the zip file => Install Now
  2. Activate the plugin in the Admin => Plugins menu
sections.faq:
No questions yet.

Don’t hesitate to let a comment on the forum or to report bugs if you found some.
https://wordpress.org/support/plugin/fg-recent-plugins
sections.changelog:
1.1.0

New language: Esperanto
Tested with WordPress 6.5

1.0.0

Initial version
